dialogue_metadata.inferred_vibe: Sarcastic and dismissive host (A) versus an informative and concerned host (B).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, another earthquake in California, I guess? More shaking, whatever.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, another earthquake in California, I guess? More shaking, whatever.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No! No, wait, actually, like, totally not California this time. This was, um, Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No! No, wait, actually, like, totally not California this time. This was, um, Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Residents of southern Kazakhstan felt the tremors of an earthquake early on March 11.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Kazakhstan. Right. Sounds riveting. So, what, like, a big one?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazakhstan. Right. Sounds riveting. So, what, like, a big one?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, not big big, but, you know, early March 11th, at, uh, 1:26 AM Astana time. People definitely felt it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, not big big, but, you know, early March eleventh, at, uh, one twenty six a m Astana time. People definitely felt it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the Ministry of Emergency Situations, citing the National Scientific Center for Seismological Observations and Research, the earthquake was recorded at 01:26 Astana time by the seismic station network.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: At two points. Right. I mean, my, like, dog sneezing probably causes more tremors.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: At two points. Right. I mean, my, like, dog sneezing probably causes more tremors.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The estimated intensity of the tremors reached two points in Zharkent, Panfilov district, Zhetisu region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But, Host_A, it was on the border, the Kazakhstan-China border. That's, uh, that's gotta be significant.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But, Host_A, it was on the border, the Kazakhstan-China border. That's, uh, that's gotta be significant.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The epicenter was located on the Kazakhstan-China border.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Significant how? No one died, no buildings fell down. Says right here. No casualties.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Significant how? No one died, no buildings fell down. Says right here. No casualties.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Authorities stated that no casualties or structural damage had been reported.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, no, I know, but it's, like, active, you know? And get this, there was another one.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, no, I know, but it's, like, active, you know? And get this, there was another one.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, on March 8, an earthquake struck the East Kazakhstan region, with its epicenter 48 kilometers from the city of Zaysan in a mountainous area.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, joy. Another one. Tell me it was just, like, a heavy truck driving by.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, joy. Another one. Tell me it was just, like, a heavy truck driving by.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Seriously, March 8th. East Kazakhstan region. Epicenter near Zaysan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seriously, March eighth. East Kazakhstan region. Epicenter near Zaysan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, on March 8, an earthquake struck the East Kazakhstan region, with its epicenter 48 kilometers from the city of Zaysan in a mountainous area.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so two small ones. Far away. No damage. My point stands. Who actually cares?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so two small ones. Far away. No damage. My point stands. Who actually cares?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Authorities stated that no casualties or structural damage had been reported.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's a pattern, Host_A! It's, like, a regional seismic shift. You can't just ignore it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a pattern, Host_A! It's, like, a regional seismic shift. You can't just ignore it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, you literally just said "two points." I'm pretty sure I can ignore it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, you literally just said two points. I'm pretty sure I can ignore it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But the frequency. The location. It's, uh, it's something to keep an eye on.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the frequency. The location. It's, uh, it's something to keep an eye on.
